public class zeta.format.FormatInfo

(source file: FormatInfo.java)
java.lang.Object
   |
   +----zeta.format.FormatInfo
The pure class interface. 
public class FormatInfo
Instances of the FormatInfo class are used in the process of formatting with the Format.buildFormat method. They are used to detect sharing and cylcles in object structures.

Author:
Jacob Wieland (ughosage@cs.tu-berlin.de)
Version: $Id: FormatInfo.java,v 1.1.1.1 1998/09/01 10:51:13 wg Exp $
See also:
buildFormat, Formattable

FormatInfo()

Assign a general type to the given object
generalType(Object)
Retrieve the general type of an object
getLabel(Object)
Return a format for representing a label of a previously visited object
unvisit(Object)
Remove the given object from the set of visited objects. The next time it is formatted it
visit(Object)
Visit the given object and return its label number.
visitAndGetLabel(Object)
Visit the given object the first time, generating a label for it and returnings its format.
visitNumber(Object)
Access to the number of a label of visited object.
visited(Object)
Test whether the given object has been visited before with this FormatInfo.

FormatInfo
public FormatInfo();

visited
public boolean visited(Object ob);
Test whether the given object has been visited before with this FormatInfo.

getLabel

public Format getLabel(Object ob);
Return a format for representing a label of a previously visited object.

visitAndGetLabel

public Format visitAndGetLabel(Object ob);
Visit the given object the first time, generating a label for it and returnings its format.

visitNumber

public int visitNumber(Object ob);
Access to the number of a label of visited object.

visit

public int visit(Object ob);
Visit the given object and return its label number.

unvisit

public void unvisit(Object ob);
Remove the given object from the set of visited objects. The next time it is formatted it will be treated has if it had never been seen before.

addGeneralType

public void addGeneralType(Object ob,
                           Class type);
Assign a general type to the given object. This is used by the internal generic format functions.

generalType

public Class generalType(Object ob);
Retrieve the general type of an object. Used by the internal generic format functions.
